member.name: T:Tizen.Applications.DataControl.Consumer
member.summary: Represents the Consumer class for the DataControl consumer application.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.DataControl.Consumer.Insert(Tizen.Applications.Bundle)
member.summary: Sends the insert request to the provider application.
member.remarks: The OnInsertResult will recieve the result of this API.
member.exception: Thrown in case of an invalid parmaeter.
Thrown in case if a permission is denied.
Thrown when the message has exceeded the maximum limit (1MB).
Thrown in case of any internal error.

The Order statement for the select query.
Select the row count per page.
member.exception: Thrown in case of an invalid parmaeter.
Thrown in case if a permission is denied..
Thrown in case of any internal error.

Thrown in case of any internal error.

member.summary: Listens the DataChange event.

Thrown in case of any internal error.
